entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
